# TNA_Module

## Configuration

### TNA

```{r}
# DOWNLOAD TNA PACKAGE

#devtools::install_github("sonsoleslp/tna", force=TRUE)
library("tna")
```
### Configure installation for Module

```{r}
# INITIATION TO INSTALL IN JAMOVI

#install.packages('jmvtools', repos=c('https://repo.jamovi.org', 'https://cran.r-project.org'))
options(jamovi_home="/Applications/jamovi.app")
jmvtools::check()

```

### Update/Install module
    
```{r}
# INSTALL INTO JAMOVI

setwd("/Users/mohammedsaqr/Documents/TNAModule_latest_refactored/TNAModule")
jmvtools::install()

```
